data.persona: We follow the knights around town. We do not like those who do not like the knights. We have been following for years.
data.description:
You are in the Church Altar.
An ornate altar studded with many jewels. A chalice and a golden plate rest upon a white cloth. It is 5 feet high and 20 feet wide. The high priest stands before it while giving a sermon to his followers.
There's a chalice, a wooden bench, a hymnal, a golden plate, a white cloth, and an ornate altar here.
The high priest and the organ player are here.

You are carrying a tool and a sack.

data.short_motivation: I need to incapacitate the priest
data.mid_motivation: I am robbing the church altar of its valuables
data.long_motivation: I will sell the items I steal to help the knights financially

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give golden plate to shady merchant
